Text: EClearinghouseForwarded by David GrevelleLONECT on David Grevelle To Mark Taylor Jeffrey T CT cc Subject EClearinghouse Mark and Jeff Sullivan Cromwell is preparing a memo from our discussions last week and Ken Raisler will be in London on Thursday morning to discuss We can connected you in am Houston time or update you later in the day How can we trademark a name EnergyML is the name for our standardized data language which EClearinghouse is developing How do we start the process Thanks David

eClearinghousereview the attached letter for annoucing eClearinghouse to potential investors I would like to provide this letter with the presentation brief attached and a NonDisclosure Agreement next week in Houston For parties which complete an NDA a more detailed binder whould be provided along with a MOU Edmund is preparing an MOU and NDA Please advise Thanks David
